publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3527 Tommy Sheridan: Condemnation of Attacks on Firefighters—That the Parliament utterly condemns the reprehensible attacks on firefighters in Rutherglen, Hamilton, Castlemilk and elsewhere over the Guy Fawkes weekend; believes that that these workers deserve the support of the whole community so that they can go about their life-saving work without being needlessly endangered, and calls on the Scottish Executive to launch an intensive media and education campaign in support of the vital work carried out by firefighters and condemning the actions of the mindless minority who attack them.
S2M-3527 Condemnation of Attacks on Firefighters (lodged on 7 November 2005) Christine Grahame*
S2M-3527 Condemnation of Attacks on Firefighters (lodged on 7 November 2005) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-3527 Tommy Sheridan: Condemnation of Attacks on Firefighters—That the Parliament utterly condemns the reprehensible attacks on firefighters in Rutherglen, Hamilton, Castlemilk and elsewhere over the Guy Fawkes weekend; believes that that these workers deserve the support of the whole community so that they can go about their life-saving work without being needlessly endangered, and calls on the Scottish Executive to launch an intensive media and education campaign in support of the vital work carried out by firefighters and condemning the actions of the mindless minority who attack them. Supported by: Christine Grahame, Donald Gorrie
S2M-3527 Condemnation of Attacks on Firefighters (lodged on 7 November 2005) Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-3527 Condemnation of Attacks on Firefighters (lodged on 7 November 2005) John Swinburne*
S2M-3527 Condemnation of Attacks on Firefighters (lodged on 7 November 2005) Elaine Smith*
